titlestmt.titleproper: Finding Aid for James E. Kean photograph collection 1918-1919.
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Len Coombs

publicationstmt.publisher: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created by Len Coombs 2011
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English.

change.item: Original encoding in EAD2002 using manual tagging.

titlepage.publisher:
Michigan Historical Collections
Bentley Historical Library
University of Michigan
titlepage.titleproper:
Finding Aid for
James E. Kean photograph collection, 1918-1919.
titlepage.author:
Finding aid prepared by:
Len Coombs

did.abstract: Copies of photographs and other documents of James E. Kean, who served with the 167th Company Transportation Corps, sent to Murmansk, Russia at the end of World War I, part of the "Polar Bear Expedition."

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by J. Kendall Longe in 2010 (Donor no.: 10467).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.p: item, folder title, box no., James E. Kean photograph collection, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: James E. Kean served with the 167th Company Transportation Corps, sent to Murmansk, Russia at the end of World War I, part of the Polar Bear Expedition.

scopecontent.p: Photocopies of photographs and other documents relating to his service in Russia.
